Research difficulties: Finding reliable sources and conducting research can be time-consuming and challenging, especially if the writer is not familiar with the topic.
Writer's block: Writers may experience writer's block, which can make it difficult to start writing or continue writing once they have started.
Time constraints: Writers may have tight deadlines to meet, which can make it difficult to complete their article on time.
Lack of writing skills: Writers may lack the necessary writing skills to effectively communicate their ideas and convey their message.
Lack of editing skills: Writers may struggle with editing their work, leading to errors and a lack of clarity in their writing.
